page.title: 15A Visit to AB Electronics
page.content: On Thursday May 3rd,eleven children viited the AB Electronics Factory in Abercynon.Firstly,we went to reception wher we met by Mr. Moses who divided us into two groups to go around the factory.We went to a unit making Sinclair Computers which was next to a unit making British Telecom components. In one part of the factory they made metal connectors for Chieftain Tanks. These parts were made in one part of the factory which had many metal bending machines and lathes. We even saw electronic dashboards for cars being made and we helped test one of them.
